SELECT user_code, user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_phone, user_email, email_check, sms_check, user_birth, user_insertdate, user_updatedate, (select count(*) from register) as total_count,
(select count(*) from register where user_insertdate BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 3 MONTH) AND NOW() ) as new_user_count FROM register ORDER BY user_code DESC
limit #{index}, 5
